# OpenCog Component Integrations
# Generated by integration script

# lg-atomese integration
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/components/language/lg-atomese/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(components/language/lg-atomese)
    
    # Add dependencies
    add_dependencies(lg-atomese atomspace)
endif()

# learn integration
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/components/language/learn/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(components/language/learn)
    
    # Add dependencies
    add_dependencies(learn atomspace)
    add_dependencies(learn cogserver)
endif()

# opencog integration
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/components/integration/opencog/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(components/integration/opencog)
    
    # Add dependencies
    add_dependencies(opencog atomspace)
    add_dependencies(opencog cogserver)
    add_dependencies(opencog attention)
    add_dependencies(opencog ure)
    add_dependencies(opencog lg-atomese)
endif()
